lead_paragraph: Max has second thoughts about his relationship with Evelyn when they move in together. When Evelyn dies, he wants to move on with Olivia, but Evelyn rises from the dead to get him back.
snippet: Max has second thoughts about his relationship with Evelyn when they move in together. When Evelyn dies, he wants to move on with Olivia, but Evelyn rises from the dead to get him back.
